lines: Some time ago, rumors got out that a flock of Ixal had settled near Fallgourd. This sent most o' the folk here packin', an' the place became somethin' of a ghost town.
Thankfully, that didn't last long, for adventurers soon began arrivin' in droves. No one seems to know what brought 'em, but they breathed much-needed life back into the settlement.
Feelin' safer for the adventurers' presence, them as fled eventually came back, an' now Fallgourd thrives as it's never thrived afore.
